00011 #if !defined(Apoxi_IsrDataContainer_hpp)
00012 #define Apoxi_IsrDataContainer_hpp
00013 
00014 
00015 /*  -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016                                     Types
00017     ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00018 
00019 template<class Data, INT c_queue_size = 5> class IsrDataContainer {
00020     public:
00021         IsrDataContainer();
00022 
00023         BOOLEAN IsrPushData(const Data& data);
00024         BOOLEAN ThrPopData(Data& data);
00025 
00026     private:
00027         struct QueueEntry {
00028             BOOLEAN m_used;
00029             Data m_data;
00030         };
00031 
00032         INT m_isr_idx;
00033         INT m_thr_idx;
00034         QueueEntry m_queue[c_queue_size];
00035 
00036         void IncIdx(INT& idx) {
00037             if (idx == (c_queue_size - 1))
00038                 idx = 0;
00039             else
00040                 idx++;
00041         }
00042 
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 /*  -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     IsrDataContainer
00049     ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00050 template<class Data, INT c_queue_size> 
00051 IsrDataContainer<Data,c_queue_size>::IsrDataContainer() : 
00052     m_isr_idx(0),
00053     m_thr_idx(0)
00054 {
00055     for (INT i = 0; i < c_queue_size; i++) {
00056         m_queue[i].m_used = FALSE;
00057     }
00058 }   // IsrDataContainer
00059 
00060 
00061 /*  -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062     IsrPushData
00063     ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00064 template<class Data, INT c_queue_size> 
00065 BOOLEAN IsrDataContainer<Data,c_queue_size>::IsrPushData(const Data& data)
00066 {
00067     if (m_queue[m_isr_idx].m_used)
00068         return FALSE;
00069 
00070     m_queue[m_isr_idx].m_data = data;
00071     m_queue[m_isr_idx].m_used = TRUE;
00072     IncIdx(m_isr_idx);
00073 
00074     IsrDataManager::SetPendingDataFlag();
00075 
00076     ASSERT_DEBUG(System::GetFirstAppContainer() != 0);
00077     System::GetFirstAppContainer()->TriggerIsrDataProcessing();
00078 
00079     return TRUE;
00080 }   // IsrPushData
00081 
00082 
00083 /*  -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084     ThrPopData
00085     ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00086 template<class Data, INT c_queue_size> 
00087 BOOLEAN IsrDataContainer<Data,c_queue_size>::ThrPopData(Data& data)
00088 {
00089     if (! m_queue[m_thr_idx].m_used)
00090         return FALSE;
00091 
00092     data = m_queue[m_thr_idx].m_data;
00093     m_queue[m_thr_idx].m_used = FALSE;
00094 
00095     IncIdx(m_thr_idx);
00096 
00097     return TRUE;
00098 }   // ThrPopData
00099
